title: New: The Dance of Mechanical Birds – The Dance of Mechanical Birds
body:
Screw **The Knife** and their nine minute long single, it’s overrated anyway.

This new track from Australia’s **0.1** (going under the name **The Dance of Mechanical Birds**), is far more audacious, and much more endearing for it. Seventeen minutes of twisted vocals, collected recordings and slightly menacing guitars, this self-titled track is one of the most ambitious pieces of recording you’ll hear all year. Part **Sigur Ros**, part **Mogwai**, not only is it an experience in itself, it’s a brilliant one at that. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: A seventeen minute long epic from The Dance of Mechanical Birds.
excerpt.short: Screw The Knife and their nine minute long single, it's overrated anyway.
